name: estimate_ownership_cost
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_utils.
Tool description: FREE resources for checking VIN, getting the market value of your car, estimating the cost of ownership in US,  checking fuel economy, and more to come.
API description: Estimates the ownership cost for a vehicle over the next 5 years based on the vehicle's VIN, annual mileage, and starting mileage.

mileage_year.description: An estimate of many miles you will drive every year for the next 5 years. Defaults to 15000.

mileage_start.description: The starting mileage of the car. Defaults to 50,000 if unspecified.
